short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Avoid annoying users with a click of a button. Make csfd.cz a better place for yourself!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Let's be honest: a lot of those who post reviews or comment on this website might be offensive, boring, or just plain annoying.

This extension gives you an opportunity to avoid them completely. You can make your time on this website much more enjoyable!

Installing the extensions adds subtle elements to the page's UI. On every review or comment, there is a small button that opens a collapsible menu that can be used to add the user to a blacklist. The action is reversible and very easy to undo.

To easily manage the list of blocked users or to add users without searching for their posts, you can use the Popup. It can be activated by clicking the extension icon right next to the address bar.

The extension is easy to use, completely free, and open-source. It does not collect any user data.
